School Information (Unstructured Text)
Fee Structure:
• Annual Tuition Fee: I60,000
• Exam Fee (per term): I2,000
• Transport Fee (optional): I15,000 per year
Exam Schedule:
• Unit Test 1: July 15
• Mid-Term Exams: September 10–15
• Unit Test 2: December 5
• Final Exams: March 1–10
School Rules:
• Attendance below 75% is not permitted for final exams.
• Mobile phones are strictly prohibited on campus.
• Students must wear the prescribed uniform at all times.
• Respectful behavior towards staff and peers is mandatory.
Timetable (Sample – Class 10):
• 9:00–10:00 – Mathematics
• 10:00–11:00 – Science
• 11:15–12:15 – English
• 12:15–1:00 – Lunch Break
• 1:00–2:00 – Social Studies
• 2:00–3:00 – Computer Science
